name: LRS: Literal Rail Shooter: Proof of Concept Demo
name_original: LRS: Literal Rail Shooter: Proof of Concept Demo
description:
Arrow keys to move, A for regular fire, S for side fire.

A single level for a project I had wanted to take further at some point but have long since lost much confidence in. As such it has been uploaded as is so the work isn't entirely wasted. Maybe I'll come back to this at some later point but I wouldn't place bets on that.

Music from 8 bit booster pack by Bit by Bit Bert: https://bit-by-bit-sound.itch.io/8-bit-music-booster-pack

If you want to contact me im on Twitter as @BigBeanDotGov and I have an email at:

Bigbeandotgov@protonmail.com
